skins.shipDescription: Queen Elizabeth-class battleship - Warspite, Hull Number 03!
skins.selfIntroduction: Elizabeth-class fast battleship, Warspite, reporting in. I hold the record for the longest ranged hit on a moving target. I've come close to being defeated quite a few times, but I managed to cheat death every time. This must be my fate.
skins.acquisition: Greetings, I'm Warspite. I hold the record for the longest ranged hit on a moving target. Surprised? I'm smaller than you thought? Looks like we need to have a long talk...
skins.login: As long as I'm here, we can deal with any enemy, no matter how far they are.
skins.details: Don't be blinded by statistics. Victory depends on far more!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Your orders are absolute, Commander. They shall be my highest priority.
skins.secretaryIdle2: This grand old lady can run faster without a skirt. Want to race with me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you make fun of me one more time, you'll be eating my 15 inch shells!
skins.secretaryTouch: Body contact...? I don't hate it...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Just so you understand, I'm definitely not that sort of, erm...

skins.shipDescription: Warspite, retrofitting complete. Mm, I rather like this feeling of being rejuvenated... Now, Commander, let us make our way towards new battlegrounds!
skins.acquisition: Warspite, retrofitting complete. Mm, I rather like this feeling of being rejuvenated... Now, Commander, let us make our way towards new battlegrounds!
skins.login: My range extends even farther. Commander, send me out to fight, won't you?
skins.secretaryIdle1: It is my duty as your secretary ship to counsel you, Commander. I won't hesitate to speak my mind if you make a poor decision.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Survival is the key to becoming a stronger person.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Battle is the fire that feeds one's growth. And so I fight with all that I have, in every conflict.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, if you have something to say, just come out and say it. I'm happy to listen.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: My important parts haven't grown at all...? Seems like someone wants to taste my high-angle mounts...

skins.shipDescription: This year, I am in charge of delivering presents to the children of the Royal Navy. Let's get going once I finish decorating this Christmas tree!
skins.acquisition: This year, I am in charge of delivering presents to the children of the Royal Navy. Let's get going once I finish decorating this Christmas tree!
skins.login: Even warriors need to rest. Since it's a holiday, you shouldn't be too uptight either.
skins.details: The wreath that goes on Her Majesty's door... Hmm, Belfast told me that the best way to make it is with seashells! Commander, let's head out to sea to collect some!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, do you want a present as well? If you really want one that badly, it's not like I can't give you one...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmm... what present should I pick out for Her Majesty? It can't be too expensive or too cheap, and it can't be too exotic or too ordinary. What exactly can I get her?
skins.secretaryIdle3: If I'm delivering Christmas presents, it's only natural to go through the chimney... Eh? Wouldn't that make me seem suspicious?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, come help me decorate this Christmas tree - I'm not tall enough to reach... W-wait, who gave you permission to pick me up?!

skins.shipDescription: We have the finest equipment. Now to turn in a performance worthy of Her Majesty's beauty... Behold, the Royal Stage!
skins.acquisition: We have the finest equipment. Now to turn in a performance worthy of Her Majesty's beauty... Behold, the Royal Stage!
skins.login: The day's schedule is in your hands.
skins.details: Don't let my name fool you. Warspite is ready to fight, whenever and wherever, even onstage.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm no idol... Yes, idols are nothing like me... Hm...
skins.secretaryIdle2: What do you think of this outfit? It was made with input from the Royal Knights. Should be different from the others'.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Her Majesty is certainly all in at the moment, but I'm worried she may suddenly lose interest...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Is it time to call the police?
